description:
Sensui, Kenroku, Yukinojyo, and Adam manage to escape after being attacked by a huge horde of Gibier. They decided to take a break while on the move, only to be attacked by five men calling themselves the Galients! Do they have fight other humans now on top of the Gibier?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le Mal contre la voie du guerrier
